listitem.para: Outputs a three item list that describes the version of &GENERICNAME; which you are using. The first item is the name of the application (&PRODUCTNAME;). The second item is the version of &PRODUCTNAME;. The third item is the operating system on which you are running.

LOGOVERSION is provided so that you can write portable &GENERICNAME; programs that run on different versions of &GENERICNAME;. By knowing what version of &GENERICNAME; you are using, your program can take best advantage of what each version offers you.
LOGOVERSION is supported by other &GENERICNAME; environments, including aUCBLogo and Elicia.
